09.01.question: A sample access control requirement would be what?

09.01.A.choice: Customer service reps can modify customer files but not delete them

09.01.B.choice: Data will be encrypted for secure ordering

09.01.C.choice: All uploaded files will be checked for viruses

09.01.D.choice: The system will cost $38,900 per minute of downtime in lost revenues

09.02.A.choice: Partitioning a physical server into smaller virtual servers

09.02.C.choice: Using a laptop as a server

09.03.B.choice: Almost all or most of the application logic

09.03.C.choice: Almost none or less than half of the application logic

09.03.D.choice: Almost all of the data logic

09.19.question: Designing an architecture can be what?

09.19.A.choice: Tedious and therefore younger members of the team are usually urged to take the lead.

09.19.B.choice: Easy and therefore more experienced members of the department take the lead.

09.19.C.choice: Easy and therefore outside consultants are often sourced to do the task.

09.19.D.choice: Easy and therefore experienced internal members are sourced to the task.

09.19.E.choice: Difficult and therefore, many organizations use the skills of experienced, expert system architects (consultants or employees) who specialize in the task.
